reviews.text:
Beim 5. Mal in NYC nun auch den Time Out Market besucht. ZunÃ¤chst unten, in einer kleinen Bar und einem sehr netten Barkeeper, ein Bier getrunken und dann, auf Grund seiner Empfehlungen und unserer Recherchen nach oben und dort etwas vom Grill zu essen.
Portionen eher klein aber dafÃ¼r etwas zu teuer... guter Geschmack, aber der hohe Preis relativiert dann doch etwas die Freude am Genuss...
Wir konnten den Hipe um diesen Ort nicht ganz nachvollziehen...
Nur die Aussicht von der Terrasse ist top.

this is the kind of place you only visit twice, three at most, only for the view
is always busy
too loud on the bar
and the food? you know when you're stuck in a place that you don't have any other option than to buy what's there because there isn't any other options, so they make the food mediocre because you will buy it anyways. literally the food from here
Excellent place to spend the day, visit the rooftop, have a drink and see the beautiful views of the Brooklyn Bridge and the Manhattan Bridge.ğŸğŸ˜€
Short wait.... Service was very good and so was the food
Excelente opÃ§Ã£o para comer apÃ³s a travessia da ponte e fotos no Dumbo.

Non ho trovato il locale che cercavo, â€œPastrami Factoryâ€, ma essendo allâ€™interno del Time Out Market di Brooklyn ho deciso di recensirlo qui. Penso sia stato il peggior pastrami mai mangiato: super grasso, duro e secco al punto da lasciarne piÃ¹ della metÃ . Probabilmente il â€œPastrami Queenâ€ che câ€™era prima nello stesso spazio era di tuttâ€™altro livello, perchÃ© questo era davvero disgustoso. Sconsigliato.
The place cannot accommodate the number of people it is supposed to. There are huge lines for the toilets, making it a bad experience for families. The food is good, though.
A bit expensive but the roof top has an incredible view â™¥ï¸ğŸ’“
We picked the perfect sunny day to sit out on the terrace and admire the view of Brooklyn bridge! We only had drinks but quick service and enough seating!
Great place for food and drink with great views

Due to the misleading and absolute lack of professionalism of the Smashed NYC staff we spent over four hours in the hospital, filled with immense fear and uncertainty. This terrifying experience happened because our repeated requests and explanations were disregarded! I absolutely do not recommend this place!

At first, TimeOut Market promised corrective measures and monitoring, but now they're ignoring all messages and not responding.

If you can't ensure food is safe, don't reassure people otherwise and don't expose them to life-threatening situations!!!
busy, chaotic, tourist trap. good for the public bathroom
Very cool place. Large food selection, and the views of the Brooklyn bridge at night on the rooftop were amazing. Beautiful views!

HÃ©tvÃ©gÃ©n prÃ³bÃ¡ld kerÃ¼lni mert sokan vannak de mindenkÃ©ppen lÃ¡togasd meg.
Az emeleten talÃ¡lhatÃ³ Bark & BBQ a javasolt helyem .
Az adagok egyÃ¡ltalÃ¡n nem fÃ¶ldi embernek valÃ³k.
Amazing
Plenty of food options for whatever you crave.  Good luck finding seating if your with a group during the busy times.
Pasamos un tiempo agradable con buena comida y buen ambiente ademÃ¡s de una hermosa vista
First time visiting this place and it was a great experience!!

Was fÃ¼r eine tolle Location! Nach einem Spaziergang Ã¼ber die Brooklyn Bridge sind wir in den Time Out Market. Dieses aus roten Backsteinen gebaute GebÃ¤ude ist modern eingerichtet und es befinden sich mehrere EssensstÃ¤nde im  GebÃ¤ude, verteilt auf zwei Etagen. Man kann sich irgendwo hinsetzen und von den meisten StÃ¤nden Essen online ordern und sich dann liefern lassen. Wir haben oben gegessen, beispielsweise bei Bark BBQ und die leckere Pizza. Unterhalten wurden wir von einem Live DJ. Meine Frau, unsere Teens und ich waren total begeistert vom Time Out Market und kÃ¶nnen diesen uneingeschrÃ¤nkt empfehlen.  Ideal ist die Kombi, wie wir sie gewÃ¤hlt haben, den Sonnenuntergang bei einem Walk Ã¼ber die Brooklyn Bridge genieÃŸen und dann zum Essen in den Time Out Market. In nÃ¤herer Entfernung sind auch Ã¶ffentliche Verkehrsmittel verfÃ¼gbar.
Un endroit trÃ¨s chaleureux oÃ¹ l'on peut trouver toutes les cuisines du monde!

El mercado ofrece una gran variedad de restaurantes, pides y si no tienen sillas disponibles no os preocupÃ©is, podÃ©is moveros por todo el mercado con vuestra bandeja hasta encontrar un sitio libre. Nosotros elegimos este de hamburguesas y repetimos (Oklahoma y la Big Schmacc), buenÃ­simas y luego fuimos a por perritos ğŸ˜.
P.D.: Las cervezas son de otro local, que estÃ¡ en frente.
Great food choices but long waits and long lines. Too crowded to relax but nice view.
Heel mooi.
Bark Barbecue espectacular
Nice place to hang out but food is awful

Food court in een oud pakhuis. Hele toffe locatie. Boven dakterras met uitzicht over de 2 bruggen en een deel van Manhattan. Beperkt aantal ligbanken. Binnen meerdere restaurantjes. Drukte viel me mee. Tafels vaak wel vies. Kan beter en sneller schoongemaakt worden.
Quite the view from this place, just take the elevator to the fifth floor, grab a drink and enjoy the sight to both bridges and Manhattan
Great location in DUMBO for a variety of food â€œstallsâ€. Had fantastic pancakes and coffee.

Youâ€™ll find exactly what youâ€™re looking for â€” really tasty food and a great atmosphere. The only thing that was a bit tricky sometimes was finding a table, since it gets really busy.
Little recommendation: taste the pancakes and the huge selection of bowls. We loved it!
Nice Location, good food, crowed, sometimes slow. Nice rooftop terrace, great location. Great view.
Lugar con vistas preciosas

Great variety of food, make sure to get brisket from the Dominican BBQ place called Bark Barbeque. Well-designed indoor space and patio with a great view. The sunset view is amazing--highly recommend!

I'd never heard of this place but came for the karaoke. I was impressed.

The venue has a small stage on the top floor/roof, which was nice, and the piano player was a great accompaniest, so the singing was really fun.

You can order food from anywhere and they bring it to you, which was incredibly convenient.

And the view outside of the Manhattan and Brooklyn bridges was pretty fabulous.

Lugar espetacular!
Diversos restaurantes com as mais variada culinaria possivel.
Vale muito a pena colocar no roteiro se viagem e visitar o espaÃ§o.
Tried ordering food thru the QR code and half of everything, from every restaurant, was sold out...
Fabulous place for a gathering with great selection of food. View from the top floor is amazing to Manhatten and Brooklyn Bridge!
Juste pour le point de vue exceptionnel de New-York
Shame on TimeOut vendors for automatically adding a tip of 18% without the customers consent. This has happened multiple times. Itâ€™s not the amount, itâ€™s the principle of an unauthorized charge.
Ottimo per mangiare cibo di qualitÃ

Summary of the 5th-floor bar :
1. Rude bartenders (especially the female bartender)
2. discriminatory service that felt like racism
3. chaotic, dirty, and disorganized restaurant operation.

â€”â€”-

I do not recommend this place at all.

While the view was great, the service was absolutely terrible. Despite the crowd, there was no customer service whatsoever. Staff would throw menus and even the payment machine, which made me wonder if this was some form of discrimination.

Although there was a QR code for scanning on the table, it was difficult to tell if it was even working. The outdoor tables with the view were poorly maintained, with chairs scattered around and tables left uncleaned after customers left.

On top of that, while the food and drinks were average in taste, I was concerned about the quality and hygiene. If you plan to dine here, make sure to bring your own wet wipes or napkins. They handed me a cup with sticky drink residue running down the side.

This was by far the worst choice during my trip to New York, especially with the rude and discriminatory service from the staff.

There are plenty of better restaurants. Donâ€™t waste your time at a place like this.

â€”â€”-

Der Time Out Market in Brooklyn ist ein groÃŸartiger Ort in New York. Die Auswahl an Food-StÃ¤nden ist unglaublich vielfÃ¤ltig â€“ von Burgern Ã¼ber Pizza bis zu Sushi und Desserts ist alles dabei. Besonders toll ist die AtmosphÃ¤re: modern, lebendig und perfekt, um mit Freunden etwas zu essen oder einfach einen Drink zu genieÃŸen.

Das Highlight ist definitiv die Dachterrasse mit dem fantastischen Blick auf die Manhattan Skyline und die Brooklyn Bridge â€“ einfach atemberaubend, vor allem bei Sonnenuntergang! ğŸŒ‡

Die Preise sind fÃ¼r New York vÃ¶llig in Ordnung, das Essen frisch und die Stimmung immer super. Ich wÃ¼rde auf jeden Fall wiederkommen!

Si tratta di un enorme centro dove ci sono tanti punti vendita di cose da mangiare di tutti i tipi. Dentro poi ci sono anche i tavoli dove poter mangiare. Bagni puliti (forse c'Ã¨ un po' troppa fila). C'Ã¨ anche il roof top con altri punti vendita. Ideale per chi vuole fare un pasto diverso dal solito fast food. Bella la vista dalla terrazza.

After walking across the Brooklyn Bridge to the DUMBO (Down Under the Manhattan Bridge Overpass) area of Brooklyn my wife and I decided to have lunch at the Timeout Market foodhall.
There were many wonderful indoor food stalls options on the ground floor together with the large Cecconi's restaurant with sitting outside next to the riverside with fantastic views of the Manhattan Bridge, as well as indoors.
After looking at all the food stalls options on the ground floor, we took the lift up to check out the open air seating area on the 5th floor rooftop, as I had downloaded the App that allowed me to look at all the food options from the stalls, order anything I wanted, pay for it online and have it delivered to our table on the rooftop.
When we got to the 5th floor we discovered there was a smaller foodhall with 5 food stalls and a bar. The Bark Barbeque stall immediately caught our attention as it was the only one with a queue and we love BBQ food. So I queued up for 15 minutes and I ordered some fantastic Dominican BBQ food (beef brisket, pulled pork sandwich, smoked conitas & cornbread with honey bitter), which we enjoyed with a couple of great IPA beers that my wife had purchased from the bar, sitting at a bench table.
There was also outside seating on the rooftop for diners, in addition to a public terrace with fantastic views of the Brooklyn Bridge, Manhattan Bridge & NYC skyline.
There are toilets on the first floor, which had big queues, and inside the 5th floor foodhall. The riverside with beautiful parks and Jane's Carousel can be accessed from the back of the mall.
Of the 3 food halls we visited on this trip to NYC (Chelsea Market & Market 57 being the others) this was by far our favourite and we would highly recommend it.

We went in the late afternoon and the place was packed.
Long lines to order, and you have to hunt for a seat or wait for one to open up.
Definitely sit outside on the terrace - the view of Manhattan and the Brooklyn Bridge is amazing!
Food was super tasty, service was good, place is clean, and the vibe is great. ğŸŒ‡ğŸ´

Eine echte Ãœberraschung â€“ im allerbesten Sinne! Die AtmosphÃ¤re ist super angenehm, lebendig, aber nicht hektisch. Oben und unten gibtâ€™s viele StÃ¤nde mit ganz unterschiedlichem Essen â€“ da findet wirklich jeder was, was ihm schmeckt.

Oben gibtâ€™s eine groÃŸe Terrasse mit einem traumhaften Ausblick auf die Brooklyn Bridge, Manhattan Bridge und die Skyline â€“ besonders schÃ¶n bei Sonnenuntergang! Klar, da ist viel los, aber trotzdem wirkt alles entspannt. Es riecht Ã¼berall kÃ¶stlich, und die Preise sind fÃ¼r New Yorker VerhÃ¤ltnisse wirklich moderat.

Einziger kleiner Minuspunkt: Zur StoÃŸzeit muss man schon mal etwas Geduld mitbringen. Auf unsere Pizza haben wir etwa 20 Minuten gewartet â€“ aber die war dann auch richtig lecker.

Fazit: Ein toller Ort, um mit Freunden oder Familie etwas zu essen. Ich wÃ¼rde auf jeden Fall nochmal hingehen, wenn ich wieder in New York bin.

Time Out Market is the place to see for an absolutely breathtaking view of the Brooklyn Bridge & Manhattan Bridge. It is basically a 180 degree view from the rooftop, where you can go for free. Just take the elevator or stairs up and voila! The interior is filled with little craft vendors and an endless number of food options. There is a bathroom upstairs and downstairs in the food court areas. Live music upstairs, too, at times! This place gets crowded, so plan accordingly. It can take 30+ minutes for the food to be ready and it can be tricky to find a seat.

O Time Out Market New York Ã© um espaÃ§o gastronÃ´mico super descolado que reÃºne diversos restaurantes em um sÃ³ lugar. Ele fica no bairro de DUMBO, bem Ã s margens do East River, e ocupa um prÃ©dio de trÃªs andares.

No tÃ©rreo e no segundo andar estÃ£o os estandes com uma variedade enorme de opÃ§Ãµes culinÃ¡rias: desde massas artesanais, hambÃºrgueres, pizzas, frutos do mar e doces atÃ© pratos de diferentes culturas, como comida asiÃ¡tica, mexicana e, claro, o bom e tradicional barbecue americano â€” que foi justamente o que provamos por lÃ¡. A carne veio bem defumada, suculenta e cheia de sabor, acompanhada de molhos e acompanhamentos tÃ­picos que deixaram a experiÃªncia ainda mais especial.

AlÃ©m da comida, um dos grandes atrativos do Time Out Market Ã© o rooftop, localizado no Ãºltimo andar. O espaÃ§o tem um bar, mesas para sentar e uma vista incrÃ­vel de Manhattan, incluindo a Ponte do Brooklyn e o skyline da cidade. Ã‰ o tipo de lugar perfeito para comer bem, tomar um drink e ainda apreciar o visual.

Time Out Market New York is good. It can improve by having more bathrooms available. The wait for the women's bathroom was 30 minutes on a Saturday afternoon! Communal bench seating for dining in, first come basis. Various restaurants to order from. Ess A Bagel had a really long line!

Visited Time Out Market NYC on a Friday night it was super busy, but we found a place to sit in just 5 minutes!
The food is absolutely amazing so many great options, and totally worth the wait.
Yes, the lines are long (food stalls, restrooms, even the elevator had at least a 15-minute wait), but the lively atmosphere and incredible flavors make up for it.

Perfectly located near DUMBO and the Brooklyn Bridge, with a stunning view to top it all off.
Loved the experience , just be ready for the crowd!

It was a quick date out with my wife as my son was at a basketball game with his aunt. The food at the pizzeria was delish, fresh and savory. We had a salad and a truffle pizza. The drinks from tha bar was a nice touch. My wife had a margarita traditional and I had a watermelon drink. Canâ€™t remember the name. All together with that view made it a spectacular moment for us.

Situato tra il Brooklyn Bridge e il Manhattan Bridge locale che racchiude al suo interno diverse cucine dal mondo. Al pian terreno si hanno a disposizione piatti e preparazioni per tutti i palati. Cucina asiatica, italiana, USA e tanto altro. Si puÃ² ordinare direttamente dal tavolo scansionando un QR oppure ordinare direttamente ai vari punti ristoro. Tutti danno un vassoio, piatti in ceramica e posate in metallo che vengono poi sbarazzati dal personale interno. Tramite l'ascensore si raggiunge il rooftop gratuito che regala una vista mozzafiato sui due ponti iconici di NYC. Prezzi dei piatti un po' alti ma in linea con l'offerta della cittÃ . Consigliato.

Time Out Market â€“ A Great Spot for Food and Views

Time Out Market in Brooklyn is a vibrant food hall featuring a curated selection of some of the cityâ€™s best local restaurants and chefsâ€”all under one roof. The variety is impressive, with options ranging from classic New York pizza and burgers to international street food, desserts, and artisanal cocktails.

The quality of the food is solidâ€”nothing mind-blowing, but definitely enjoyable. Prices are on par with typical NYC standards, so be prepared to spend a bit more than you might elsewhere.

What really makes it worth the visit is the rooftop terrace. Head upstairs for a fantastic view of the Manhattan skyline and Brooklyn Bridgeâ€”especially beautiful at sunset. Itâ€™s a perfect spot to take a break and soak in the atmosphere of DUMBO.
